name: nowjs-core
description: NowCanDo Javascript Core [nowjs-core] is a  library written by TypeScript code maintains under Apache 2.0 licence

scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:release
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run changelog:update && git push && npm run clean:release
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "upgrade: Upgrade to %s for patch and some bug fixes."
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "upgrade: Upgrade to %s for minor enhancments & and bug fixes."
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "upgrade: Upgrade to %s for major features and bug fixes."
scripts.changelog:update: github-changes -o nowcando -r nowjs-core -b develop && git commit -a -m 'update: The CHANGELOG.md updated.'
scripts.docs:update: typedoc --out ./docs/documentation/ ./src/  && git commit -a -m 'update: The documentation updated.'

author: Saeed Tabrizi at NowCanDo.Com
